column4: Hello everyone. I just installed an ubuntu Jaunty on an ibook g3 (powerpc) and I'm unable to read movie with mplayer neither totem because of some altivec flags... How can I solve that ?
have you installed all the plugins?
Try going to synaptic and installing all the plugins.
which plugin ? mplayer does not have any and the needed for gstreamer segfault
There should be 3 sets of plugins for gstreamer. Good, Bad and Ugly
try vlc and see what happens.
Illegal instruction ;) I allready googled it... There is lots of people talking about it on internet, but noone give a solution except "buy a new computer"
theres always the wine option too
have you any ideo how wine work ?
well I use Crossover and it kinda just runs the exe files I need it to
Unless you can find an old rpm and convert it with alien.
Have you tried searching for an old rpm file that will install?
only other thing I can suggest is really delve into google to search for a deb
Its possible someone already did compile it from source.  Check here http://code.google.com/
